name: Glob Grab
description:
This is a game made in 3 hours for Trijam #154. Instead of defeating enemies, what if there was a twist of combining with the enemies! For our main slime, it's finally time to get some respect among their peers & get big! Luckily, slimes have a tendency to stick together when touched. To execute your brilliant plan, all you have to do is combine with fellow green slimes & stay away from incompatible yellow slimes. You'll be adored in no time!

CONTROLS:

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move
